sn36.18:1.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu …pe…
sn36.18:1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn36.18:1.3: “katamā nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.18:1.4: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.18:1.7: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
